description: Trúc Nhân was born in [[Hoài Nhơn]], [[Bình Định province|Bình Định Province]] and raised in [[Vũng Tàu]] due to family business. After graduating from Trần Nguyên Hãn High School, he moved to [[Ho Chi Minh City]], majored in [[graphic design]] at [[Văn Lang University]] and pursued singing as a [[Contingent work|Casual Job]]. In 2012, Trúc Nhân soon became the contestant of the [[The Voice of Vietnam (season 1)|first season]] of [[Giọng hát Việt|The Voice of Vietnam]], under coach Thu Minh and ended up in Top 8.
